flimsy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: flimsy cloth or clothing is light and thin
flimsy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is flimsy is not strong or well-made, and will break easily
flimsy.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a flimsy agreement is weak and can easily be damaged or broken
flimsy.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: a flimsy alliance between the two tribal groups
flimsy.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a flimsy argument or excuse does not seem very likely and people do not believe it
flimsy.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: The evidence against him is extremely flimsy.
